team.name: Amirlan Amanzholov
team.description: responsible for tournament organization and problem selection. Sholarship Awardee at Haileybury Almaty, winner of the Republican Olympiad in mathematics, International Math Olympiad 2024 silver medalist, member of the national team.

team.name: Timur Murat
team.description: responsible for web-development and problem selection. Sholarship Awardee at Haileybury Almaty, Asian Pacific Math Olympiad gold medalist and Balkan Math Olympiad 2024 bronze medalist, member of the national team.

team.name: Gleb Patyrin
team.role: Co-founder and organizer of Maths Battles Community
team.description: responsible for financial management and strategic development. Winner of various Math Olympiads, scholarship awardee at Haileybury Almaty and Richmond University.

team.name: Miron Yurkevich
team.description: responsible for tournament organization, project management and problem selection. Sholarship Awardee at Haileybury Almaty, winner of prestigious math olympiads, including International Math Olympiad 2022 and 2023 silver medals.

team.name: Alikhan Serikuly
team.description: responsible for tournament organization, project management, design and web-development. International Mendeleev Chemistry Olympiad Bronze medalist, National Math Olympiad Gold medalist, published researcher through Pioneer Academics.

team.name: Issatay Jaxykeldinov
team.description: responsible for tournament organization and SMM. CUHK Integrated Bachelor of Business Administration student, Belt & Road Scholarship Awardee. Alumni of the National School of Physics and Math, economics tutor in American Space Almaty.
